node.excerpt: It’s December 28th, 2017. Around 3 pm we get a knock on the door. It is the police department. They tell me they want to speak to my husband because of an incident that happened at the courthouse…
It’s December 28th, 2017. Around 3 pm we get a knock on the door. It is the police department. They tell me they want to speak to my husband because of an incident that happened at the courthouse…
